name: get_market_news_and_sentiment
description: This API returns live and historical market news & sentiment data from a large & growing selection of premier news outlets around the world, covering stocks, cryptocurrencies, forex, and a wide range of topics such as fiscal policy, mergers & acquisitions, IPOs, etc.

tickers.description: The stock/crypto/forex symbols of your choice. For example: 'tickers=IBM' will filter for articles that mention the IBM ticker; tickers=COIN,CRYPTO:BTC,FOREX:USD will filter for articles that simultaneously mention Coinbase (COIN), Bitcoin (CRYPTO:BTC), and US Dollar (FOREX:USD) in their content.

topics.description: The news topics of your choice. For example: topics=technology will filter for articles that write about the technology sector; 'topics=technology,ipo' will filter for articles that simultaneously cover technology and IPO in their content.

time_from.description: Articles published after this time would be searched.

time_to.description: Articles published before this time would be searched.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_special_tickers
description: This endpoint returns the top 20 gainers, losers, and the most active traded tickers in the US market.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
